DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Brief Questionnaire of Smoking Craving(QSU-Brief) Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, dried and prepared for smoking or ingestion._Of short duration, extent, or distance._The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._The desire to experience the effect(s) of a previously used psycho-active substance. It has to be noted that not all drug craving is based on withdrawal, since craving can often occur in the absence of withdrawal._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, dried and prepared for smoking or ingestion._Of short duration, extent, or distance._The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._The desire to experience the effect(s) of a previously used psycho-active substance. It has to be noted that not all drug craving is based on withdrawal, since craving can often occur in the absence of withdrawal._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, dried and prepared for smoking or ingestion.

Concepts.definition: The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties.

Property.preferredDefinition: Of short duration, extent, or distance.:The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.:The desire to experience the effect(s) of a previously used psycho-active substance. It has to be noted that not all drug craving is based on withdrawal, since craving can often occur in the absence of withdrawal.:Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: Of short duration, extent, or distance.
The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

The desire to experience the effect(s) of a previously used psycho-active substance. It has to be noted that not all drug craving is based on withdrawal, since craving can often occur in the absence of withdrawal.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
